archimate:Device.name: Order Picker (OP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Portable use for community outreach, training sessions, and educational programs • Indoor and outdoor presentations in varying lighting conditions
Specifications:
• Resolution: Full HD (1920x1080) (4K but not necessary for portability) • Brightness: 3,000 – 5,000 lumens (suitable for different lighting conditions) • Contrast Ratio: 5,000:1 or higher • Projection Technology: LED or DLP (for durability and portability) • Throw Ratio: 0.8 – 1.5 (for short to medium distance projection) • Keystone Correction: Auto vertical/horizontal adjustment • Connectivity Options: HDMI, USB-C, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, SD card slot • Audio: Built-in speakers (10W+) with external speaker support • Power Options: Rechargeable battery (3-5 hours runtime) or AC adapter • Mounting Options: Tripod-compatible, table setup • Additional Features: Compact design, wireless screen sharing, carry case for portability
